RelatedSentence: Authorities in Milan recently ordered several searches at the suspects ' homes in relation to the political propaganda , according to the report .
Police found and confiscated racist and anti-Semitic material at the scene .
In 2012 an ADL poll of anti-Semitism found that 43 % of Italians , when asked if Jews have too much power in international financial markets , said the statement was probably true .

Likewise , 35 % of Italians said at least 3 out of the 4 anti-Semitic stereotypes suggested were probably true .
